Key Match Events: Buddy Hield scored 28 points, including 7 three-pointers, in the Warriors' 124-106 comeback victory over the Pelicans.
Lindy Waters III scored 21 points and grabbed a career-high eight rebounds, finishing a game-best plus-26 in 31 minutes.
Zion Williamson and Brandon Ingram combined for 61 points in the Pelicans' loss to the Warriors.
Pre-Game Insights: The Warriors will face the Pelicans for a home rematch on Wednesday night after a 20-point comeback victory.
Stephen Curry (left peroneal strain) and De'Anthony Melton (strained lower back) are OUT for the Warriors.
Dejounte Murray (Left Hand; Fracture), Trey Murphy (Right Hamstring; Strain), Herb Jones (Right Shoulder; Strain) and CJ McCollum (Right Adductor; Soreness) are OUT for the Pelicans.
